p: ADA activity determination was performed as described by Guisti and Galanti [ 18]. In brief, 50 μL of tissue homogenate, followed by 50 µL of 21 mM of adenosine, pH 6.5, was incubated at 37°C for 60 min. Absorbance was measured at 630 nm using a Microplate Spectrophotometer (Molecular Devices, Sunnyvale, CA). Enzyme activity was calculated in units per liter (U/L).
